title: Rural Banking Products
author: HBL Content
summary: The Rural Banking Products document outlines various financial services under Rural Finance (RF), aimed at supporting rural individuals and enterprises, particularly in agriculture. HBL Rural Banking offers five primary loan types: Running Finance Farm Production, Tractor Financing, Dairy & Livestock Financing, Poultry Financing, and Fisheries Financing, each catering to specific agricultural needs with minimum financing requirements. These loans include flexible repayment options, such as quarterly or biannual payments, and varying terms based on the type of financing. Documentation for loan approval includes valid identification, proof of agricultural activity, and a clean credit report, with specific parameters applicable to each product.
